translations: n.周围地区，邻近地区，附近

sentences.sentence: There is no hospital in the immediate vicinity.
Only a handful had returned to work in the immediate vicinity.
sentences.translation: 只有少数几个人回到附近地区工作。

sentences.sentence: There were a hundred or so hotels in the vicinity of the station.
sentences.translation: 在车站附近有大约一百家左右的旅馆。
